snippet: The Fair of the Society of Agriculture and Horticulture of Westchester County opened at White Plains yesterday. The ground chosen for the exhibition was beautifully located, and all the arrangements were made upon a liberal scale. The display was ...
lead_paragraph: The Fair of the Society of Agriculture and Horticulture of Westchester County opened at White Plains yesterday. The ground chosen for the exhibition was beautifully located, and all the arrangements were made upon a liberal scale. The display was not as large as we have seen at former fairs of this Society, but the quality was decidedly better.

headline.main: Fair of the Westchester Agricultural Soceity.; ADDRESS OF JAMES L. WHITING.
